spell2.name: STRANGLING PRISON
spell2.description: Fire a massive vine cluster that pulls nearby enemies to its center and Imprisons them.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile with a downward delay that creates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: The projectile deals 10 damage, while the spell field deals 70 damage. While imprisoning enemies, it deals 20 damage every 0.5s

spell3.name: THORNLASH WALL
spell3.description: Target a location and grow a Thornlash Wall. When Awakened, it strikes nearby enemies attacked by Groot and his allies.

spell4.name: IRONWOOD WALL
spell4.description: Target a location and grow an Ironwood Wall. When the wall is Awakened, damage dealt by Groot and nearby allies grants Groot Bonus Health.

attributes.label: HEALING
attributes.value: 40 extra health per second, up to 250

spell5.name: SPORE BOMB
spell5.description: Throw an explosive Spore Bomb that splits into multiple small explosive spores.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile with a downward delay that creates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: The projectile itself deals no damage, while Spore Bomb deals 55 damage and explosive spores deal 10 damage

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: Spore Bomb generates a spell field with a 5m spherical radius, while small explosive spores create a spell field with a 1.5m spherical radius

spell6.name: FLORA COLOSSUS
spell6.description: Wooden walls near Groot will Awaken, activating an extra effect. Right-click while building a wooden wall to continue building additional walls.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Persistent spell field that surrounds the caster

spell7.name: FURIOUS FLORA
spell7.description: Perform a combo with his arms, and the third strike will slightly Launch Up the hit enemy airborne.
